participant_1.background:
I start my day with a hearty stew, inspired by my idol, Thierry Henry.
I relax and spend time with my friends and family when I am not working.
i own a home with 5 acres of land.
I have a contentious relationship with my family because of my uncle's actions.
I got to meet one of my favorite Italian chefs at a marketing event.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.
i enjoy running.
I live in a big city where I can be more anonymous, but I still need to go back to my hometown to take care of my parents.
i love to sew.
i have allergies.

content.text: Hi, I'm Alex! I love starting my day with a hearty stew, inspired by my idol, Thierry Henry. What do you like to do in the morning?
Hi Alex, I'm Jen! I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling. Do you like to go out on the water?
I love the water, but I don't go out on it much. I'm more of a homebody.
That's okay! I love to sew, and I love spending time with my family.
I love to spend time with my family too, but I have a contentious relationship with my uncle because of his actions.
I'm sorry to hear that. I have allergies, so I can't always visit my family in my hometown.
I hope your allergies aren't too bad! I'm glad you have something you love to do, like running.
Thank you! I love running, and I love living in a big city where I can be more anonymous.
That's great! I hope you have a wonderful day, Jen.
